movies.title: The Vineyard
movies.plot: Dr. Elson Po is one of the world's most famous wine growers. He has a magic potion which has kept him handsome and alive during the centuries. However, lately the magic which rejuvenates him seem to be less and less effective. As a side project he make movies and invites a group of young, aspiring actors to his private island for a party, believing that the young, handsome actress Jezebel can be his new source of life.
movies.simplePlot: Dr. Elson Po is one of the world's most famous wine growers. He has a magic potion which has kept him handsome and alive during the centuries. However, lately the magic which rejuvenates ...

biography.bio: James Hong was born in Minneapolis, Minnesota, USA. He studied civil engineering at the University of Minnesota, but at some point along the way became interested in acting. He graduated from the University of Southern California and practiced for 1½ years as a road engineer with the County of Los Angeles. He took sick leaves and vacation time to do films. He finally quit engineering to focus on acting full time. He is one of the founders of the East-West Players, the oldest Asian American theater in Los Angeles. He served as president and charter member of the Association of Asian Pacific American Artists. Hong is one of the most prolific and well-recognized Asian-American character actors of movies and television. He currently lives in Los Angeles and is planning to produce and direct his own films.
biography.name: James Hong

biography.bio: Karen Lorre has been acting since she was a teen. She studied pre-med in college, with an emphasis on Psychobiology, the study of how thoughts and feelings from the brain affect the body. While still in college at UCI, Karen took an acting class up in Hollywood. She had one of those bright light moments as she was acting that felt better than anything she had ever experienced before. She realized that acting was the only thing she wanted to do. Karen played Tina Lord Roberts on One Life to Live for 4 years and was nominated for an award. She also was a series regular on the Showtime show, Bedtime. Karen has done many guest stars on a variety of shows, both comedy and drama. Karen has done about 60 commercials. Karen also teaches people how to love unconditionally and she makes guided meditations so that people can feel incredible in many different areas of life. Karen is super fit, she loves to do yoga, acrobatics, skip on the beach, her TRX and her pro ski simulator.
biography.name: Karen Lorre

biography.bio: Cheryl Lawson was born on December 20, 1963 as Cheryl Ann Lawson. She is known for her work on 24 (2001), Ocean's Eleven (2001) and Firefly (2002).
biography.name: Cheryl Lawson

biography.name: Sean P. Donahue

biography.bio: Sherri Ball is an actress, known for The Vineyard (1989).
biography.name: Sherri Ball

biography.bio: Karl-Heinz Teuber was born in Germany. He is known for his work on Amadeus (1984), Clownhouse (1989) and Bottle Shock (2008).
biography.name: Karl-Heinz Teuber

biography.bio: Ruth Lin is an actress, known for The Vineyard (1989), Magnum, P.I. (1980) and Hawaii Five-O (1968).
biography.name: Ruth Lin

biography.bio: Harry Mok was born in San Jose California of Chinese descent. He began his film career early on performing martial arts fight sequences in independent films. Mr. Mok has worked in the capacity of a stuntman, actor, producer, director and writer. He began directing music video's in 1996 and has directed and produced for such artist as, Master P, Jermaine Dupree, Celly Cell, E40, The Mosse, Silk the Shocker, C-Murder, Stevie B, and Jimmy Hendrix etc. In 1997 Mr. Mok directed the first ever Hendrix music video for Experience Hendrix / Universal MCA.
biography.name: Harry Mok

biography.bio: Lissa Zappardino is an actress, known for The Vineyard (1989) and Forgive Me Father (2001).
biography.name: Lissa Zappardino

biography.bio: Mark De Alessandro is known for his work on Titanic (1997), Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl (2003) and Rocky Balboa (2006). He has been married to Chandra De Alessandro since March 4, 2000.
biography.name: Mark De Alessandro

biography.bio: Vivian Lee is an actress, known for Gen-X Cops (1999), Li (1995) and The Vineyard (1989).
biography.name: Vivian Lee
